index.headline: Hello, I'm Thomas Plat
index.asideCopy: I am a passionate Web-Developer from Germany. As a juvenile I wanted to create my own game and thus I was sucked into the world of Web Development. This was 15 years ago. Ever since I am ecstatic about developing dynamic websites and web applications. It is not only development itself that is fun for me. I have a strong focus on clean, testable and reusable code.

skills.headline: The way I work
skills.copy: Over the course of my carreer I have worked with many technologies, languages and concepts that allowed me to overcome any obstacles along my way. Get to know the toolchain that I am working with on a daily basis.
